scripts.build:packages: npm run build:types && npm run build:prisma && npm run build:utils
scripts.setup: npm run setup:db && npm run setup:cdn && npm run setup:redis
scripts.clean: find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && npm run clean:build
scripts.docker:create-network: docker network ls | grep -w poveroh_network || docker network create poveroh_network
scripts.docker-dev:db: npm run docker:create-network && cd ./docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml up -d --build db
scripts.docker-dev:api: npm run docker:create-network && cd ./docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml up -d --build api
scripts.docker-dev:app: npm run docker:create-network && cd ./docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml up -d --build app
scripts.docker-dev:redis: npm run docker:create-network && cd ./docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml up -d --build redis
scripts.docker-dev:studio: npm run docker:create-network && cd ./docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml up -d --build studio
scripts.docker-dev:cdn: npm run docker:create-network && cd ./docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml up -d --build cdn
scripts.docker-dev: npm run docker:create-network && cd ./docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml up -d --build db api app redis cdn
